channel.description: Recent content on Today's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: March 11, 2023 Today's Verse Isaiah 26:4 [4] Trust in the LORD forever, for the LORD GOD is an everlasting rock. Today's Memory Verse Matthew 11:28-30 - Come to me, all who labor and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest. Take my yoke upon you, and learn from me, for I am gentle and lowly in heart, and you will find rest for your souls. For my yoke is easy, and my burden is light.
